title: Economy update in Kaduna: Small Business Grants and Artisan Micro‑Grants
body:
Stakeholders emphasized inclusive access, noting that reliable infrastructure remains key for sustained progress.

Local officials in Kaduna announced support for artisan micro‑grants, aiming to reach more families across the region.

2025-12-26 — In Kaduna, educators highlighted small business grants as schools adopt new methods to improve student outcomes.

Experts say fintech adoption is accelerating, with communities reporting practical benefits in everyday life.

Analysts expect new partnerships to emerge, particularly between schools and local tech startups.

Parents expressed optimism, while calling for continuous training and affordable devices.

The program will roll out in phases, with pilot initiatives scheduled over the next quarter.
